channel.title: Welcome! on opt-models
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome! on opt-models

item.title: Welcome to the Optimization Impostors' Compendium
item.description: Introducing the Compendium, its intended audience, its two main focuses - a code-first approach to building optimization models and increasing the speed of optimization computation - me (Martin Laskowski) and my motivations for creating this resource.

item.title: What's inside...
item.description: An overview of the contents and the release structure of the Optimization Impostors’ Compendium.

item.title: Talk on Maven
item.description: Discuss the topics covered here on Maven: a social media platform structured around an “interest graph” rather than a “friend/social graph”. Maven feels good to me, like a glimpse of a possible shift in online culture from our current limbic-system hacking reality to something healthier and promoting of genuine serendipity.
